text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Candidate" has the meaning stated in § 1-101 of the Election Law Article.

section.section: "Credit" means payment by a credit card or promissory note.
"Credit" includes selling or pledging personal property in exchange for cash or tokens.

"Gaming device" means:
a gaming table, except a billiard table, at which a game of chance is played for money or any other thing or consideration of value; or
a game or device at which money or any other thing or consideration of value is bet, wagered, or gambled.
"Gaming device" includes a paddle wheel, wheel of fortune, chance book, and bingo.

text.section: "Political committee" has the meaning stated in § 1-101 of the Election Law Article.
"Token" means a poker chip, bingo chip, or other device commonly used instead of money in the playing of a gaming device.
